body_html: @anj-s @jsh11b appreciate the answer, I didn't read about the limitations of MirroredStrategy. Will use tf.contrib.estimator.add_metrics to clone the estimator with metrics and use the new estimator in the evaluation phase of training. This will suit our use case just fine.
body_text: @anj-s @jsh11b appreciate the answer, I didn't read about the limitations of MirroredStrategy.  Will use tf.contrib.estimator.add_metrics to clone the estimator with metrics and use the new estimator in the evaluation phase of training.  This will suit our use case just fine.
body: @anj-s @jsh11b appreciate the answer, I didn't read about the limitations of `MirroredStrategy`.  Will use `tf.contrib.estimator.add_metrics` to clone the estimator with metrics and use the new estimator in the evaluation phase of training.  This will suit our use case just fine.
